name: tamato-berry
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases happiness by 10/5/2. Lowers Speed effort by 10.
short_effect: Drops Speed Effort Values by 10 and raises happiness.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow TAMATO.
flavor_text.emerald: Makes a POKéMON friendly but lowers base SPEED.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Can be ground up into a powder as an ingredient for medicine.
